name: Benjamins WISEflow shortcuts
description: Custom keyboard shortcuts til navigering p√• WISEflow

to-manager-page-original.description: Go to the manager page with the original user with the same ID as the Flow you are on.

to-assessor-page-original.description: Go to the assessor page with the original user with the same ID as the Flow you are on.

to-participant-page-original.description: Go to the participant page with the original user with the same ID as the Flow you are on.

to-super-page-original.description: Go to the super page with the original user with the same ID as the Flow you are on.
